item.description:
The topic of this event is how to create profitable collaborations and joint ventures (JV). We’ll talk about why collaboration is essential, pitfalls to avoid and how to find the right people to work with.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://bit.ly/ThZwCK

Date: Thursday, December 13, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Nina Kaufman, small business champion, business attorney, author, and speaker.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://bit.ly/ThZwCK

During this program you will learn:

  • The biggest mistake entrepreneurs make in working with JV partners.
  • The questions you should be asking to find out if a potential partner is right for you.
  • How much (or little) of an investment you should plan to make in a strategic alliance. (This applies to investing both time and money.)
  • Why you should care about collaborating with other people, even when you’re getting plenty of clients.
  • Who owns the intellectual property that a JV creates?

Get Show Access Info here: http://bit.ly/ThZwCK
item.name: Cash In Big with Smart Strategic Alliances
